scripts.dist: rm -rf packages/*/dist; yarn hje:dist; yarn rje:dist; yarn aria:dist; yarn mantine:dist; yarn code:dist;
scripts.hje:dist: rm -rf packages/headless-json-editor/dist; yarn hje:bundle; yarn hje:ts
scripts.hje:analyze: mkdir tmp; PACKAGE_NAME=headless-json-editor webpack --profile --json > tmp/hje-stats.json; webpack-bundle-analyzer tmp/hje-stats.json
